footer.aboutText: I am a passionate full-stack engineer focused on creating high-quality, user-friendly digital products with over 5 years of experience.

0.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
0.description: Responsible for designing and developing enterprise applications, leading the frontend team in implementing new tech stacks. Optimize system performance and enhance user experience.

achievements.0: Refactored core application architecture, reducing load time by 50%
achievements.1: Designed and implemented microservices architecture, improving system scalability
achievements.2: Introduced modern CI/CD workflows, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes

1.title: Full-Stack Developer
1.description: Responsible for developing multiple cross-platform applications, implementing the entire process from design to deployment. Built scalable application architecture using React and Node.js.

achievements.0: Developed company's core product with over 100K monthly active users
achievements.1: Designed and implemented a component library, improving team development efficiency by 30%
achievements.2: Optimized database queries, reducing server load by 40%

2.title: Frontend Developer
2.description: Developed responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks, collaborating with UI/UX designers and backend teams to optimize user experience.

achievements.1: Implemented responsive design covering all major devices
achievements.2: Introduced frontend automated testing, reducing regression bugs by 80%
